name: Superseeds Presents #2: Rouge
description:
Superseeds Presents brings characters, items and campaigns from the Superseeds column to fans everywhere.

This second issue presents Mutants & Masterminds 3rd edition stats for Rouge, the red-manipulating supervillainess from Superseeds #104. She is a PL12 adversary for your games.

The file also includes the original column content, plus three brand new adventure seeds, making it six in total.

Unleash the power of the Armagedroid upon your player characters!
